title: Regal Polki and Ruby Cascade Haaram - A Timeless Masterpiece
materials: Faceted Ruby (మాణిక్యము) Pendant. Features the renowned Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: This stunning haaram boasts three cascading layers of meticulously set Polki diamonds in a unique triangular floral pattern. The central ruby pendant, cradled in a delicate Polki diamond setting, adds a regal touch. The intricate design reflects the grandeur of Nizam-era jewelry, reimagined for the modern bride. The setting style enhances the brilliance of the diamonds, creating a mesmerizing sparkle.
colors: Predominantly gold with the fiery red of the ruby pendant and the subtle shimmer of the Polki diamonds.
occasions: and other special occasions where you want to make a lasting impression. An ideal bridal piece that embodies tradition and elegance.
description: This haaram is not just jewelry; it's a statement of heritage and timeless beauty. The use of high-quality Polki diamonds and a vibrant ruby pendant ensures a dazzling presence. Its design reflects the rich cultural heritage of Hyderabad and South India. Crafted with precision and care, this piece will be cherished for generations. The multi-layered design makes it a versatile piece that can be paired with various outfits.
